      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Add continent with given name and control value if it is valid entry.

      Add country to the map as per the argument parameters if it is a valid entry.

      Adds link between the two argument countries to indicate their neighborhood.
      boolean MapValidator.continentConnectivityCheck(GameMap map)
      Checks if all continents are connected sub-graphs or not
      org.jgrapht.Graph<Country,org.jgrapht.graph.DefaultEdge> MapValidator.createGraph(GameMap map)
      Creates a graph representation of the map using JGraphT library.
      static boolean MapValidator.doesContinentExist(GameMap map, java.lang.String continentName)
      Checks if continent with same name already exists in the map
      static boolean MapValidator.doesCountryExist(GameMap map, java.lang.String countryName)
      Checks if country with same name already exists in the same continent.
      boolean MapValidator.notEmptyContinent(GameMap map)
      Check if any continent is empty and does not hold any country.
      boolean StartUp.populateCountries(GameMap map, java.util.ArrayList<Player> players)
      Responsible for distributing countries amongst players and assigning initial armies.
      boolean RunCommand.removeContinent(GameMap map, java.lang.String continentName)
      Removes the continent and all the countries present in that continent.
      boolean RunCommand.removeCountry(GameMap map, java.lang.String countryName)
      Removes the country and removes link to all its neighbors.
      boolean RunCommand.removeNeighbor(GameMap map, java.lang.String countryName, java.lang.String neighborCountryName)
      Removes the link between the two neighboring Country objects
      boolean RunCommand.saveMap(GameMap map, java.lang.String fileName)
      Saves GameMap object as ".map" file following Domination game format
      void LoadMap.setMap(GameMap map)
      Setter method for setting the game map.

      Shows map in tabular form.
      void RunCommand.showMap(GameMap map)
      Prints the continents, countries, and neighbors for each country present in the map.
      boolean RunCommand.validateMap(GameMap map)
      Runs various validity checks to ensure that map is suitable for playing the game.
